Welcome to my progress log for my PhD research.

## Quick Access

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
get_latest_report <- function() {
  files <- list.files("reports", pattern = "\\.qmd$", full.names = FALSE)
  if (length(files) == 0) {
    return(NULL)
  }
  latest_file <- files[which.max(file.info(file.path("reports", files))$mtime)]
  base_name <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(latest_file)
  return(base_name)
}

latest <- get_latest_report()

cat("- [View Progress Reports](progress-reports.html)\n")
if (!is.null(latest)) {
  cat("- [Latest Report](reports/",latest, ".html)\n", sep = "")
  cat("- [Download Latest as Word Document](reports/", latest,".docx)\n", sep = "")
} else {
  cat("- No reports available yet\n")
}
```

## About This Site
This site contains my weekly Progress, Problems, and Plans (PPP) reports. Each report is available online and can be downloaded as PDF or Word document.
